org.jooby

Interface Session.Store

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CaffeineSessionStore, CassandraSessionStore, CouchbaseSessionStore, EhSessionStore, GuavaSessionStore, HcastSessionStore, MongoSessionStore, Neo4jSessionStore, RedisSessionStore, Session.Mem, SpySessionStore
    Enclosing interface:
    Session

    public static interface Session.Store
    Read, save and delete sessions from a persistent storage.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

      Single secure random instance.
